description:
X-Men - Hellbound (001 - 003) (2010) (digital) (Minutemen-Faessla) 


Fighting for the future of mutantkind, the X-Men are locked in battle with Bastion, staving off his forces even by sacrificing themselves. When Magik is gravely injured in battle, she instinctively flees to the sanctuary of LimboÃ¢â‚¬Â¦only to fall into the clutches of a longtime adversary hoping to wrest the powerful Soulsword - and control of Limbo - from her grasp. Now, a small team of X-Men venture in after her, but they are met only by unexpected peril: a horde of demons out for blood, Magik nowhere in sight, and a concealed evil walking amongst them.
